@tayz_BETH @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @MPGeorgeEustice @JamesBevanEA H2S is a colourless, toxic gas that can be created by the decomposition of organic matter such as rotting vegetation or wastewater.
